page.title: 12LOOKING AFTER THE FARM
page.content: I live on a farm. Every morning while the owners are away mum,Ben and I get dressed. Then we go next door and get the key from the shed.Then we let the cat in the house,and put some milk in a bowl on top of the deep freeze so that the dog won't get it, and put some cat food there as well. After that we go to the stables. The horses are not in there because they are grass kept horses,but their food is kept in there.This is some oats,hay and a bucket of water, which is put into the oats.Then we put the feed into large bowls,and throw the hay into the field.Afterwards we feed the chickens. We fill a bowl with grain and throw it out on to the yard.Next we collect the eggs from the hen house.There are five egg boxes.One hen is a broody hen,and we have a job getting it off the eggs.
